languages.text: {n}Преподобный грустно улыбается.{/n} "Я знаю, что влечет тебя за Вольным Торговцем, сестра Арджента. Ты ищешь сражений, потому что они помогают тебе не чувствовать, сколь пусты и никчемны наши жизни. Они дают иллюзию смысла. Возможно, однажды ты разочаруешься в ней, возможно — не успеешь и погибнешь прежде. Как бы то ни было, я желаю тебе удачи на новом пути".

traits.locale_text: {n}Преподобный грустно улыбается.{/n} "Я знаю, что влечет тебя за Вольным Торговцем, сестра Арджента. Ты ищешь сражений, потому что они помогают тебе не чувствовать, сколь пусты и никчемны наши жизни. Они дают иллюзию смысла. Возможно, однажды ты разочаруешься в ней, возможно — не успеешь и погибнешь прежде. Как бы то ни было, я желаю тебе удачи на новом пути".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."
languages.original_text: {n}Преподобный грустно улыбается.{/n} "Я знаю, что влечет тебя за Вольным Торговцем, сестра Арджента. Ты ищешь сражений, потому что они помогают тебе не чувствовать, сколь пусты и никчемны наши жизни. Они дают иллюзию смысла. Возможно, однажды ты разочаруешься в ней, возможно — не успеешь и погибнешь прежде. Как бы то ни было, я желаю тебе удачи на новом пути".

You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Time is fleeting, and it has played a peculiar joke on you, Sister Argenta. In this transient world, one cannot help but feel the emptiness and futility of life. You are running from this feeling... so be it, then — you may go. Sooner or later, you will realize that there is no escaping it."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯悲伤地笑了笑。{/n}“我知道是什么在呼唤你追随行商浪人，阿洁塔修女。你渴望战斗，因为它可以让你忘记我们的人生是多么空虚，多么毫无价值。它会提供人生意义的假象。或许有一天，你会放弃这种幻觉，又或许你会在那一天到来之前就战死沙场。但无论怎样，我都祝你在新的旅途中一切顺利。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯悲伤地笑了笑。{/n}“我知道是什么在呼唤你追随行商浪人，阿洁塔修女。你渴望战斗，因为它可以让你忘记我们的人生是多么空虚，多么毫无价值。它会提供人生意义的假象。或许有一天，你会放弃这种幻觉，又或许你会在那一天到来之前就战死沙场。但无论怎样，我都祝你在新的旅途中一切顺利。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus sonríe adustamente:{/n} «Sé qué es lo que la impulsa a seguir a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, hermana Argenta. Busca el combate porque la ayuda a olvidar lo vacías y mezquinas que son nuestras vidas. Es una ilusión a la que puede que renuncie algún día, aunque quizá muera antes de comprenderlo. En cualquier caso, le deseo suerte en su nuevo camino».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus sonríe adustamente:{/n} «Sé qué es lo que la impulsa a seguir a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, hermana Argenta. Busca el combate porque la ayuda a olvidar lo vacías y mezquinas que son nuestras vidas. Es una ilusión a la que puede que renuncie algún día, aunque quizá muera antes de comprenderlo. En cualquier caso, le deseo suerte en su nuevo camino».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは寂し気に笑った。{/n}「なぜ自由開拓者と共に行きたいのか理解できます、シスター・アルジェンタ。我々の人生がいかに空虚で無価値であるかを忘れるために、あなたは戦いを求めている。価値ある命という幻想を与えてくれるからだ。いつかその幻想を捨てる日が来るかもしれない…あるいは、その日が来る前に死ぬかもしれない。いずれにせよ、新たに選んだ道での幸運を祈ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは寂し気に笑った。{/n}「なぜ自由開拓者と共に行きたいのか理解できます、シスター・アルジェンタ。我々の人生がいかに空虚で無価値であるかを忘れるために、あなたは戦いを求めている。価値ある命という幻想を与えてくれるからだ。いつかその幻想を捨てる日が来るかもしれない…あるいは、その日が来る前に死ぬかもしれない。いずれにせよ、新たに選んだ道での幸運を祈ろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus lächelt traurig.{/n} "Ich weiß, was Euch antreibt, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu folgen, Schwester Argenta. Ihr sucht den Kampf, weil er Euch hilft, zu vergessen, wie leer und wertlos unser Leben in Wahrheit ist. Er bietet die Illusion einer Bedeutung. Vielleicht werdet Ihr diese Illusion eines Tages überwinden, oder vielleicht sterbt Ihr vor diesem Tag. Jedenfalls wünsche ich Euch Glück auf Eurem neuen Pfad."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus lächelt traurig.{/n} "Ich weiß, was Euch antreibt, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu folgen, Schwester Argenta. Ihr sucht den Kampf, weil er Euch hilft, zu vergessen, wie leer und wertlos unser Leben in Wahrheit ist. Er bietet die Illusion einer Bedeutung. Vielleicht werdet Ihr diese Illusion eines Tages überwinden, oder vielleicht sterbt Ihr vor diesem Tag. Jedenfalls wünsche ich Euch Glück auf Eurem neuen Pfad."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus sourit tristement.{/n} « Je sais ce qui vous pousse à suivre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, sœur Argenta. Vous avez soif de combats, car ils vous aident à oublier le vide et l'inutilité de nos existences. Ils vous donnent l'impression trompeuse que les choses ont un sens. Vous vous libérerez peut-être de cette illusion un jour, à moins que vous ne périssiez avant. Mais quoi qu'il en soit, je vous souhaite bonne chance sur cette nouvelle voie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus sourit tristement.{/n} « Je sais ce qui vous pousse à suivre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, sœur Argenta. Vous avez soif de combats, car ils vous aident à oublier le vide et l'inutilité de nos existences. Ils vous donnent l'impression trompeuse que les choses ont un sens. Vous vous libérerez peut-être de cette illusion un jour, à moins que vous ne périssiez avant. Mais quoi qu'il en soit, je vous souhaite bonne chance sur cette nouvelle voie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus hüzünle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Seni Hür Tacir'i takip etmeye iten şeyin ne olduğunu biliyorum Rahibe Argenta. Muharebe arıyorsun çünkü yaşamlarımızın ne kadar boş ve manasız olduğunu unutmana yardımcı oluyor. Bir anlam yanılsaması yaratıyor. Belki bir gün bu yanılsamadan vazgeçersin, belki de o gün gelemeden ölüm seni bulur, orası bilinmez. Ne olursa olsun, sana yeni yolunda bol şans dilerim."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus smiles sadly.{/n} "I know what it is that calls you to follow the Rogue Trader, Sister Argenta. You seek combat, for it helps you to forget how hollow and worthless our lives truly are. It offers the illusion of meaning. Perhaps you will relinquish this illusion one day, or perhaps you will die before that day comes. Regardless, I wish you luck on your new path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus hüzünle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Seni Hür Tacir'i takip etmeye iten şeyin ne olduğunu biliyorum Rahibe Argenta. Sen muharebe arıyorsun çünkü yaşamlarımızın ne kadar boş ve manasız olduğunu unutmana yardımcı oluyor. Bir anlam illüzyonu yaratıyor. Belki bu illüzyonu bir gün bir kenara atarsın, belki de o gün gelemeden önce ölürsün. Her ne olursa olsun, sana bu yeni yolunda iyi şanslar diliyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
